description: A React component implementing a login page with session check, CSRF token fetch, and login form submission.

methods.name: checkSession
methods.description: Verifies if the user session is active, redirects if authenticated.

methods.name: fetchCsrf
methods.description: Fetches CSRF token from backend and stores it in state.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles the login form submission, manages login process, error handling, and redirects.
